mapper.update: update competation set competation_name = #{competationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, competation_time = #{competationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, competation_fujian1 = #{competationFujian1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startapply = #{startapply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fabu_time = #{fabuTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_limit = #{memberLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiezhibaoming = #{jiezhibaoming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, competation_fujian2 = #{competationFujian2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startbaoming = #{startbaoming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, competation_explain = #{competationExplain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, generalization = #{generalization,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where competation_id = #{competationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select competation_id, competation_name, competation_time, competation_fujian1, startapply, fabu_time, member_limit, jiezhibaoming, competation_fujian2, startbaoming, competation_explain, generalization from competation where competation_id = #{competationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select competation_id, competation_name, competation_time, competation_fujian1, startapply, fabu_time, member_limit, jiezhibaoming, competation_fujian2, startbaoming, competation_explain, generalization from competation
SELECT competation_id FROM eaas.competation where competation_id = (select max(competation_id) from eaas.competation)
